short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple VAT calculator with adjustable rate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We have created a super simple VAT Chrome extension, it allows you to add or remove VAT and to choose the VAT rate if you need to adjust it from the 20% default level
